sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel' import './gettingstarted.css' import teams from './assets/team.jpg' import portfolio from './assets/portfolio-20201008.jpeg' import tradingBlock from './assets/tradingblock.jpg' const GettingStarted = () => { return(
Get Started

SimBull is a stock market for sports.

We have created a long term market so you can enjoy sports and keep your money from going into the sportsbooks pockets.

Curious about what other people are thinking about your share? Go to the trade feed to watch new trades and offers in real-time.

It's really that simple. Buy a share, collect your win payouts, and enjoy having some skin in the game.

After you buy a share, you can start collecting win payouts that day. You get a win payout each time your teams win.

All your teams, offers, account value, and amount of win payouts are located in the portfolio.

First, check out the Trading Block and find a team to buy.

But which team should you buy?

A lot of people buy their favorite team to start, while our most savy users are looking for the shares that are cheapest relative to how many wins they'll get in the future.
) } export default GettingStarted
